item.title: Install sqlserver in wsl2 and ubuntu 22.04
item.description: I searched web, first several links in SERP are not the offical one from microsoft. I tried them and failed to install mssql due to errors Error: 'deb [arch=amd64 https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ xenial \ stable' invalid] or Canâ€™t install MS SQL Server on Ubuntu 21.10. At last I follow the instruction from microsoft. I successfully installed mssql server in my wsl+ubuntu22.04 environment. curl -fsSL https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/microsoft-prod.

item.title: Run anki in wsl2+ubuntu 22.04
